units.contents:
# Generated by Butane
[Unit]
Requires=systemd-fsck@dev-disk-by\x2dpartlabel-mnt_data.service
After=systemd-fsck@dev-disk-by\x2dpartlabel-mnt_data.service

[Mount]
Where=/mnt/data
What=/dev/disk/by-partlabel/mnt_data
Type=ext4

[Install]
RequiredBy=local-fs.target
units.name: mnt-data.mount

units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Run K3S Install
Wants = network-online.target
After = network.target network-online.target
ConditionPathExists=/opt/k3s-install.sh
# ConditionPathExists=!/etc/kube
[Service]
Type=forking
TimeoutStartSec=180
RemainAfterExit=yes
KillMode=process
ExecStartPre=/bin/sleep 30
ExecStart=/usr/bin/sh -c "/opt/k3s-install.sh"
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: k3s-install.service
